modality.description: Single cell RNA-seq (GEX) or single cell ATAC-seq (ATAC)?

celltypes.description: Tab-separated file mapping cell barcodes to celltype information. It must contain at least the columns 'Index' and 'Cell_type'.

subset_bed.description: Optionally subset the BAMs before filtering with a BED file. Make sure the 'chr' conventions match (ie. chr1 or 1)!

ignore_base_quality.description: Optionally ignore base quality scores in the BAM. The pipeline will artificially set the quality to the maximum value for all bases, to circumvent SComatic's filtering.

mutations.description: A folder with prior scomatic mutations output.

publish_celltype_bams.description: Publish the celltype-split BAMs to the celltype_bams/ subdirectory?

max_nM.description: Maximum number of mismatches permitted to consider reads  for analysis. By default, this filter is switched off, although we recommed using --max_nM 5. If applied, this filter requires having the nM tag in the bam file.

max_NH.description: Maximum number of alignment hits permitted to consider reads for analysis. By default, this filter is switched off, although we recommend using --max_NH 1. This filter requires having the NH tag in the bam file.

min_MQ.description: Minimum mapping quality required to consider reads for analysis. Set this value to 0 to switch this filter off. --min_MQ 255 is recommended for RNA data, and --min_MQ 30 for DNA data.

n_trim.description: Number of bases trimmed by setting the base quality to 0 at the beginning and end of each read.

min_ac.description: Minimum alt count to consider a genomic site for further analysis.

min_af.description: Minimum alt allele fraction to consider a genomic site for further analysis.

min_dp.description: Minimum coverage to consider a genomic site for further analysis.

min_cc.description: Minimum number of cells required to consider a genomic site for further analysis.

min_bq.description: Minimum base quality permited for the base counts.

max_dp.description: Maximum number of reads per genomic site that are read by pysam pileup (to save time and memory. Set this value to 0 to switch this filter off (recommended for high-depth sequencing).

max_cell_types.description: Maximum number of celltypes carrying a mutation to make a somatic call.

pons.description: Panel of normals (PoN) file to be used to remove germline polymorphisms and recurrent artefacts.

editing.description: RNA editing file to be used to remove RNA-editing sites.

config_profile_description.default: The Wellcome Sanger Institute HPC cluster (farm22) profile
